Name: Grayland
About the game: A noir story of a tiny bird fighting in the colourless world of Grayland. Grayland is a story driven side-scroller game with unique art style. You, as a tiny bird find yourself in the middle of the war between the Human and the Alien forces. The war scorched the earth and made the once peaceful land radioactive. Fly and fight your way through the radiation filled lands, save your loved one and your children. Fly inside the mines and ruins, eliminate the radioactive hotspots, avoid the drones hunting you, and beat the bosses. During the levels you face different enemies and continuously discover the puzzles of the story. F E A T U R E S: ● 16 challenging handcrafted levels ● Various boss fights ● Heart catching story ● Unique atmosphere and art style ● Beautiful music Never give up, show them that even if you're a tiny being, your actions are important, be the ONE who saves the World.
